Html:
Hi, I have the HTML file generated for a TRX file after running an ordered test.
The ordered test is collection of test methods from about 4 different classes and namespaces arranged in the order I want the VSTS to run.
The report only shows the total number of test methods and the number passed/failed. It does not show the names of test methods and if the test passed/failed for a particular test method.

Can you please help me on this issue.

Thanks,
Chamara
